hero.title: From Board Games to Team Building
hero.subtitle: Play to know, build a team to win! From friendly banter to the serious battle of ideas.

feature1.title: Skill-Based and Custom Games
feature1.description: We don't just roll dice here! With board games designed for the business environment, practice soft skills like negotiation, risk-taking, and strategy in action.

feature2.title: Networking in Action
feature2.description: You need to know people through challenges. In Hambazi, you learn and compete together to build your network and find your team members through complete understanding.

feature3.title: Mentoring and Experience Transfer
feature3.description: Hear key startup concepts from those who have walked this path and learn how to turn your idea into a product.

feature4.title: Practical Ideation Challenge
feature4.description: It's not just theory! An exciting challenge in the startup space awaits you to bring your learnings into practice.

feature5.title: Seed Capital and Cash Prizes
feature5.description: Top teams don't leave empty-handed. Top teams receive cash prizes. There's also a chance to attract support for brilliant ideas.
